alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Iron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 01 at 3:26AM EDT until April 01 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches...greatest to the east of Iron River. Northeast winds gusting as high as 50 mph will cause blowing and drifting snow with low visibilities. * WHERE...Iron and Dickinson Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds, in combination with wet, heavy snow, may lead to downed tree limbs and power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
